TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
BECAUSE YOU ANNOYED IT BY SAYING SOMETHING IS IN IT! 

WAITER! THERE'S A BIG OCTOPUS-LIKE CREATURE IN MY SOUP! 

 

Edited December 26, 2022 by Abel Military Services
It's not even a new page

It's not a soup. It's it itself.

Waiter! Don't take away their plates, just put my portion onto them, it will be a  one and a half portion for same price.

And why your portion is made of Plutonium? 

Hey waiter where is my soup?

Your soup is in you and you are in the soup.

Remember the Soup will be with you, always.

Yes. 

Waiter! Why that tank is still on the ground? I hit it with 20 anti-tank cannon shells and 6 anti-tank missiles!

It's not a tank, it's a cauldron.

Waiter! A gammaburger with cheesium.

Please Wait, we're still transporting the cheeseburger to the gamma lab. 

Waiter! Plutonium-238 please.

Here you n go. Plutonium-1, Plutonium-2, Plutonium-3, ...

Waiter! Wait... Oh, ...

You ordered a cone of silence?

Customer: There is a Sloop in my soup.

Be careful! It gets sloppy. 

W.A.I.T.E.R, where is my soup

You can find it with a Geiger counter.

Waiter! A fire extinguisher, please. They smoke too much.

The thing you need is oxygen mask because somebody released carbon dioxide into the air. 

Waiter! T-45 please

Sorry, sir, but the T-45 ingredient is prohibited by the sanitation rules.

Waiter! Is there an alternative way to get the 45th in your club? You understand me right...

I only have a Nine Iron sir.

Is that a banana in my soup, or is it smiling?

It's Ana, sir. We ban her, but she returns. We call her BanAna.

Waiter! Why this snack is a stack?
Waiter! There's a sub-orbital trajectory in my soup!

It's a soup-orbital trajectory.

Waiter! Don't take away the plates, I will make a plate armor.

If you pay for this expensive plate that is 200 years old, and BTW it is useless. 

Waiter! Can you give me some explodium?

Wait a minute, sir. Once the plodium is over, we'll bring you its ex-plodium.

Waiter! Is a napkin a napling?

Shhh, don't wake it up.

Customer: If I go crazy, then will you still call me Souperman?

Depends on the soup. Maybe you are a borshchechelovek.

Waiter! A radium candy, please.

I'm sorry that we are running out of sugar. We'll use Berrylium instead. Enjoy your Radium-berrylium neutron source! 

Waiter! Is dado here?

Only Daddario.

Waiter! Fried parrot in carrot, please.

I'm sorry that we don't have fried parrots, we'll use raw zombie meat instead. 

Waiter! Do you have any roasted anti-tank shell with depleted Uranium armor?

Yes, it's right under your seat.

Waiter! Put potato to tomato.
